Class LevelPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Page
      • LevelPage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Level1, Level2, Level3, Level4, Level5, Level6

    public abstract class LevelPage
extends Page
    Abstract class representing a level page in the game. Provides common functionality and components for level pages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  LevelPage.AmmoComponent
      Component representing the ammo label in the level page.
      protected class  LevelPage.BgImageComponent
      Component representing the background image of the level page.
      protected class  LevelPage.FgImageComponent
      Component representing the foreground image of the level page.
      protected class  LevelPage.LevelComponent
      Component representing the level name label in the level page.
